message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Can you meet me at that price?

Hi Bob, I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not comfortable selling it to you for $80. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $85. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'd be willing to go up to $82.50. Can you consider that?

Hi Bob, I understand you're still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $84. It's the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great deal for you.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still not comfortable going above $82. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. Can you consider $83?
